description:
This ultralight pouch is made with tear-resistant X-Pac material. Carry your crampons or ice screws in it, or sit on it in the snow when putting your boots on.

  • Durable X-Pac™ fabric is a mix of nylon and polyester with a Mylar film for waterproofness
  • Flap closure can be locked shut with a carabiner
name: Petzl Ultralight Pouch
